entry.title: Wednesday: Chance of showers. High 8. POP 30%
entry.summary: Becoming a mix of sun and cloud this morning. 30 percent chance of showers this afternoon. Wind becoming west 20 km/h gusting to 40 near noon. High 8. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 5:00 AM MDT Wednesday 12 April 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Chance of rain showers or flurries. Low minus 7. POP 30%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy with 30 percent chance of rain showers or flurries early this evening. Clearing late this evening. Wind west 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light this evening. Low minus 7. Wind chill minus 10 overnight. Forecast issued 5:00 AM MDT Wednesday 12 April 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Mainly sunny. High 10.
